title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You might enjoy your own company most now. Its likely a relief not having to explain or conceal anything from others. You believe you could accomplish more when left alone. However, if you cant avoid people today, commit to absorbing and exuding as much positivity as you can. Be determined to share and relish jointly whatever activities or events youre participating in. Whether youre flying solo or with someone else, life is too short to be miserable. Eckhart Tolle wrote, All the things that truly matter -- beauty, love, creativity, joy, inner peace -- arise from beyond the mind. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
